sentences.en: All isolation techniques may be aesthetically unacceptable or even dirty.
sentences.cn: 所有的隔离方法都有可能在美观方面使人难以接受,或甚至是肮脏的.

sentences.en: Brimelow, as did we, judged existing Soviet drafts unacceptable.
sentences.cn: 布赖姆洛和我们一样, 认为苏联现在的这个草案是不能接受的.

sentences.en: I found her attitude totally unacceptable.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她的态度让人完全不能接受。

sentences.en: It is totally unacceptable for children to swear.
sentences.cn: 孩子说脏话是完全不能容忍的。
这是一场政治冒险,使不得.

sentences.en: Manchester still suffers from urban blight and unacceptable poverty.
sentences.cn: 曼彻斯特仍然受到城区脏乱和严重贫困问题的困扰。

sentences.en: Modern readers would find such naive solution totally unacceptable.
sentences.cn: 现代读者会觉得这种天真的结局完全无法接受.

sentences.en: Racism is wholly unacceptable under any circumstances.
sentences.cn: 无论在何种情况下，种族主义都是千万要不得的。

sentences.en: She told the industry in blunt terms that such discrimination is totally unacceptable.
sentences.cn: 她直截了当地告诉业界，这种歧视是完全无法接受的。
这种行为完全不能接受.

sentences.en: Such behaviour is unacceptable and will be punished.
sentences.cn: 这种行为不可容忍，必将受到惩罚。

sentences.en: That will never do , ie is completely unacceptable.
The perpetuation of nuclear deployments is morally unacceptable.
sentences.cn: 继续部署核武器在道义上让人无法接受。

sentences.en: The press has been blamed for intruding into people's personal lives in an unacceptable way.
sentences.cn: 新闻媒体因为以令人难以容忍的方式侵扰人们的私生活而一直受到指责。

sentences.en: What if relations between you and your neighbour have reached deadlock, and their behaviour is still unacceptable?
sentences.cn: 如果你和你的邻居已闹僵了，而他们的行为还是令人难以接受，那怎么办？

sentences.en: Winter is, in a word, unacceptable.
sentences.cn: 总之, 冬天是难以让人接受的.

words.tran_cn: 不能接受的；不受欢迎的

trans.tran_cn: 不能接受的，不受欢迎的，难答应的，不中意的
trans.tran_en: something that is unacceptable is so wrong or bad that you think it should not be allowed
